alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:30PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY RAIN WITH RISING SNOW LEVELS IS EXPECTED LATE WEEK FOR THE SOUTH CENTRAL INNER CHANNELS... An atmospheric river will bring heavy rainfall, warming temperatures, rising snow levels, and possibility of flooding across the south- central Panhandle this weekend. A Flood Watch is now in effect for the region. Heavy rain begins Thursday night followed by a break on Friday. Heavy rain then returns Friday night and persists into Saturday night. The current forecast is for rainfall amounts of around 3 inches from Thursday night through Saturday night, with the heaviest precipitation likeliest Friday night into Saturday night. Snow levels are forecast to rise to 4,000 to 5,000 feet. Rain along with a melting mountain snowpack will increase the risk of minor flooding issues. Please stay tuned to local updates should further flood bulletins be issued.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
